Subject Line: Start listening to your favorite music
Headline: Your party starts now.
Body-Copy: Now you can listen to millions of songs. All for free. Start exploring the music, from the artists you already know to the artists you'll love next. The more you listen, the more you'll get personalized playlists and recommendations.

Headline: Waktunya berpesta!
Body-Copy: Kini kamu bisa mendengarkan jutaan lagu secara gratis. Saatnya untuk mengeksplor musik, mulai dari penyanyi yang kamu kenal hingga calon penyanyi favoritmu.Semakin banyak kamu mendengarkan, semakin banyak kamu mendapatkan playlist personal dan rekomendasi.

Headline: Deine Party startet jetzt!
Body-Copy: Ab sofort kannst du dir Millionen von Songs anhören. Kostenlos! Schau dich um und entdecke Musik von deinen aktuellen und zukünftigen Lieblingskünstlern. Je mehr du streamst, desto mehr Empfehlungen und persönliche Playlists erstellen wir für dich.

Subject Line: Commencez à écouter vos titres préférés
Headline: Que la fête commence !
Body-Copy: Vous pouvez maintenant écouter des millions de morceaux. C'est gratuit ! Commencez à parcourir notre catalogue, des artistes que vous connaissez à vos prochains artistes préférés. Plus vous écouterez de titres, plus vous recevrez de playlists et suggestions personnalisées.

Subject Line: Comece a ouvir suas músicas favoritas
Headline: Sua festa começa agora.
Body-Copy: Agora você pode ouvir milhões de músicas. Tudo de graça. Comece a descobrir novas músicas, desde os artistas que você já conhece até seus próximos artistas favoritos. Quanto mais você ouvir, mais receberá playlists personalizadas e recomendações.

Subject Line: Ponte a escuchar tu música favorita
Headline: ¡Que empiece la fiesta!
Subhead: Te damos la bienvenida a Spotify
Body-Copy: ¡Ahora puedes escuchar millones de canciones totalmente gratis! Comienza a explorar la música de los artistas que ya conoces y los nuevos que te encantarán. Mientras más escuches, más personalizadas se volverán tus playlists y recomendaciones.

Subject Line: Empieza a escuchar tu música favorita
Headline: ¡Que empiece la fiesta!
Subhead: Te damos la bienvenida a Spotify.
Body-Copy: Ahora puedes escuchar millones de canciones. ¡Y gratis! Explora toda esa música, desde tus artistas preferidos a los que todavía no conoces... ¡pero que pronto te enamorarán! Cuanto más escuches, más personalizarás tus playlists y tus recomendaciones.

Subject Line: L'ascolto della tua musica preferita inizia adesso
Headline: Che la festa abbia inizio
Body-Copy: Milioni di brani aspettano solo di essere ascoltati. Gratis. Inizia ad esplorare questo mondo musicale, dagli artisti che già ami a quelli che amerai. Più ascolti e più riceverai consigli e playlist personalizzate.

Subject Line: Start listening to your favourite music
Headline: Your party starts now.
Body-Copy: Now you can listen to millions of songs. All for free. Start exploring the music, from the artists you already know to the artists you'll love next. The more you listen, the more you'll get personalised playlists and recommendations.

Subject Line: Start listening to your favourite music
Headline: Welcome to the party.
Body-Copy: Now you can play all your favourite songs. All for free. Search for the artists you love, and discover new artists too. The more you listen, the better your music recommendations will be.

Subject Line: Start listening to your favourite music
Headline: Your party starts now.
Body-Copy: Now you can listen to millions of songs. All for free. Start exploring the music, from the artists you already know to the artists you'll love next. The more you listen, the more you'll get personalised playlists and recommendations.

Subject Line: Start listening to your favourite music
Headline: Your party starts now.
Body-Copy: Now you can play all your favourite songs. All for free. Search for the artists you love, and discover new artists too. The more you listen, the better your music recommendations will be.

Headline: Que la fête commence !
Body-Copy: Vous pouvez maintenant écouter des millions de chansons. Gratuitement. Commencez à explorer notre catalogue, des artistes que vous connaissez à ceux qui feront bientôt partie de vos préférés. Plus vous écouterez, plus vous recevrez des listes de lecture et des suggestions personnalisées.
